row.Title: (PERSON_1) elected in (FACTION_1)
row.Description_body: (PERSON_1) has been elected to the Local Council in the (FACTION_1) region. (PERSON_1) is well known for his negative stance against the (FACTION_2) faction. (FACTION_1) members will have to be more cautious when traveling the (FACTION_2) Region.

row.Title: Wanted Criminal, (PERSON_1) captured in (FACTION_1) space
row.Description_body: The wanted criminal raider (PERSON_1), was captured today by Commander (PERSON_2). The fugitive was hiding in the outskirts of the (FACTION_1) region. The (FACTION_2) faction administrators have been notified and have yet to comment on the arrest of (PERSON_1).

row.Title: (FACTION_1) Council Member (PERSON_1)'s Referendum.
row.Description_body: The decision made by (PERSON_1) of the (FACTION_1) last week has been upheld by the Chief Counsel and is currently waiting approval from the (FACTION_2) Liaison, (PERSON_2). Once this referendum has been accepted, it will be a matter of days before the (FACTION_1) Council votes.

row.Title: (PERSON_1) Scandal effects (FACTION_1) Relations
row.Description_body: The breaking scandal involving (PERSON_1)'s illegal hiring of (PERSON_2) of the (FACTION_2) faction has brought recent Council decisions into question once again. Members of the (FACTION_1) Council have raised additional concerns about the nature of these private dealings. An investigation will soon be underway as Judicial officials prepare to state verdict upon the accused.

row.Title: Diplomatic Exchange at the (FACTION_1) Capitol
row.Description_body: (PERSON_1) remarked today at the (FACTION_1) Capitol that, 'We need to take a harsh stance against this ongoing criminal activity, propagated by (PERSON_2) of the (FACTION_2) faction.'. Members of the (FACTION_1) Council agree to take a vote on how future relations with the (FACTION_2) may be improved.

row.Title: Will (PERSON_1) Propose?
row.Description_body: Recently, celebrity (PERSON_1) was spotted at a well known jewelry merchant in fashion district of the (FACTION_1) Region. It is speculated that there could be an upcoming marriage proposal in the future for Lady (PERSON_2). I guess we'll have to see how (PERSON_2)'s father of the (FACTION_2) faction will take it. Things could get interesting if this proves to be true.

row.Title: (PERSON_1) suspected of cheating on (PERSON_2)
row.Description_body: Photographs have surfaced of (PERSON_1) leaving a popular night spot in the (FACTION_1) district in the early morning hours with an unknown friend. Clearly (PERSON_2) was not happy about it and refused to comment when asked about what this could mean for their marriage. According to (FACTION_2) civil code, this could prove costly for (PERSON_1).

row.Title: Skirmish between (FACTION_1) and (FACTION_2) in (SECTOR_1)
row.Description_body: (PERSON_1) of the (FACTION_1) faction has been credited with instigating a dispute with some local members of the (FACTION_2) faction. It is recommended that members of these factions avoid (SECTOR_1) until this skirmish has resolved itself.

row.Title: (FACTION_1) mining operation invade (SECTOR_1)
row.Description_body: Miners of the (FACTION_1) faction have uncovered a pocket of valuable (RESOURCE_1) in the (SECTOR_1) sector. Since no faction can lay claim to these riches, those who arrive with the proper equipment will reap the benefits of this resource anomoly. The (FACTION_1) miners have a decent head start, so you might want to get started if you plan to take advantage of this opportunity.

row.Title: Market demand drops in (FACTION_1) regions
row.Description_body: Market demand has dropped in a small number of (FACTION_1) controlled sectors. (PERSON_1), a local official has claimed that with the recent influx of labor, the demand for various goods and services have been met, thus forcing locals to find new jobs.

row.Title: Demand for Ore falls in (FACTION_1) locations
row.Description_body: Market demand has fallen for local ore. The current mining trends have finally met the demands of production. A number of (FACTION_1) stations have been affected. As demand decreases for this ore, profits for these regions have just now started to feel its effect.

row.Title: Demand for market items fall in (FACTION_1) locations
row.Description_body: Market demand has fallen for local ore. The current mining trends have finally met the demands of production. A number of (FACTION_1) stations have been affected. As demand decreases for this ore, profits for these regions have just now started to feel its effect.

row.Title: Market demand increases for Ore in (FACTION_1) region
row.Description_body: Market demand has increased for raw local ore. The current mining trends show these buy orders have affected a small number of (FACTION_1) stations. As demand increases for this ore, stability and security will likely spread and boost mining operations in the area. (PERSON_1), a local to the region was quoted saying, 'We knew this was coming, it always goes in cycles.'.

row.Title: Demand for Weapons rise in (FACTION_1) region
row.Description_body: Market demand for Active Modules is on the rise. The current security issues show these buy orders have affected a small number of (FACTION_1) stations. As demand increases for these modules, stability and security will likely spread and boost security operations in the area. (PERSON_1), a local to the region was on record saying, 'About time somebody does something to help us out here.'.

row.Title: Trade goods are in demand for local (FACTION_1) sectors
row.Description_body: Market demand has increased for trade goods across the region. The current market trends show these buy orders have affected a small number of (FACTION_1) stations. As demand increases for these products, stability and security will likely spread and boost market revenues in the area. (PERSON_1), a local to the region was quoted saying, 'This will help to bring people into our community.'.

row.Title: Demand increases in (FACTION_1) region
row.Description_body: Market demand has increased for a number of general items. The current market trends show these buy orders have affected a small number of (FACTION_1) stations. As demand increases for some items, stability and security will likely spread and boost the economy of the area. (PERSON_1), a local to the region was quoted saying, 'We knew this was coming, it always goes in cycles.'.

row.Title: Market prices stabilize in (FACTION_1) region
row.Description_body: Market prices have updated to reflect current commercial trends, and this correction has been reported to affect a small number of (FACTION_1) stations. As prices begin to level out, stability and security will boost productivity in the area. (PERSON_1), a local to the region was quoted saying, 'This could be very profitable for my community!'.

row.Title: (FACTION_1) Reports a slow down in production
row.Description_body: Market prices in the (FACTION_1) region have been on the rise after the unexpected shutdown of a main production facility in the area. (PERSON_1), the facility Overseer, assured the crowds today, that both sides were working to find a profitable agreement for everyone involved. Production is said to restart next cycle.

row.Title: Market selloff in (FACTION_1) region
row.Description_body: With the recent influx of low quality components spreading throughout the (FACTION_1) region, local markets have decided to purge old inventory in hopes of bring back customers. 'The new advertising campaign seems to be working!', said local shop owner (PERSON_1). With a little time, these markets should stabilize, thus promoting growth in the region.

row.Title: (FACTION_1) Reports an increase in production
row.Description_body: Market supply in the (FACTION_1) region have been on the rise after the re-opening of a main production facility in the area. (PERSON_1), the facility Overseer, assured the crowds today, that both sides were very happy to find a profitable agreement for everyone involved. Production is said to be in full swing.

row.Title: Market selloff in (FACTION_1) region
row.Description_body: With the recent influx of refugees spreading throughout the (FACTION_1) region, local markets have suffered with low supply and empty shelves. These stations are in dire need of resupply if they are expected to continue to sustain the local populations with food and water.

row.Title: (FACTION_1) Has restocked a number of stations.
row.Description_body: Market supply in the (FACTION_1) region have been on the rise after a convoy of transport merchants restocked the area. (PERSON_1), the facility Overseer, assured the crowds today, that both sides were very happy to find a profitable trade agreement for everyone involved.

row.Title: Restock operation at (STATION_1) has been completed.
row.Description_body: Market supply at (STATION_1) has been resupplied. (PERSON_1), the facility Overseer, informed the media today that crews are working around the clock to keep our markets supplied.

row.Title: Market warehouses are filling fast in (FACTION_1) regions
row.Description_body: Market supply has increased as new production facilities in the (FACTION_1) region become fully operational over the next 2 cycles. It can be expected that local stations will begin to receive additional deliveries of goods and hardware.

row.Title: Market Sell Orders on the rise in (FACTION_1) regions
row.Description_body: Market supply has increased as new production facilities in the (FACTION_1) region become fully operational over the next 2 cycles. It can be expected that local stations will begin to receive additional deliveries of goods and hardware.

row.Title: Heavy Market Sell orders increases in (FACTION_1) regions
row.Description_body: Market supply has increased as new production facilities in the (FACTION_1) region become fully operational over the next 2 cycles. It can be expected that local stations will begin to receive additional deliveries of goods and hardware.

row.Title: Huge Market Sell orders increases in (FACTION_1) regions
row.Description_body: Market supply has increased as new production facilities in the (FACTION_1) region become fully operational over the next 2 cycles. It can be expected that local stations will begin to receive additional deliveries of goods and hardware.

row.Title: (RESOURCE_1) discovered moving thru (SECTOR_1)
row.Description_body: Miners of the (SECTOR_1) sector have uncovered a pocket of valuable (RESOURCE_1). Since no faction can lay claim to these riches, those who arrive with the proper mining equipment will reap the benefits of this resource anomoly. Miners in the area have yet to lay claim to any of these resources, so you might want to get started if you plan to take advantage of this opportunity.

row.Title: Salvage discovered passing thru (SECTOR_1)
row.Description_body: Salvagers of the (SECTOR_1) sector have uncovered a cache of valuable (RESOURCE_1). Since no faction can lay claim to this debris, those who arrive with the proper salvage equipment will reap the benefits of this resource anomoly. Salvagers in the area have yet to lay claim to any of these resources, hurry if you want to take advantage of this opportunity.

row.Title: Raider spotted in the (FACTION_1) region
row.Description_body: It has been reported that Raiders have been hiding in the region. It is recommended that all pilots traveling through this area keep their sensors active and weapons hot until the Astrox Security Patrol has time to clear this threat from the area.

row.Title: Tensions rise in (SECTOR_1). Raiders expected.
row.Description_body: After the A.S.P. recently left the area, Raiders have decided to return in an attempt to recover some of the loot that they were forced to leave behind. Be very careful when traveling through the (FACTION_1) region, as their exact whereabouts are not currently known.

row.Title: A gang invaded the (FACTION_1) region
row.Description_body: A general warning has been issued for the (FACTION_1) region. Dangerous criminal elements have been reported in the area, and authorities recommend all citizens remain alert at all times. It is recommended that you do not travel alone, and if you do... you should be heavily armed for combat.

row.Title: Dangerous Raiders take camp in the (FACTION_1) region
row.Description_body: Dangerous Raiders have been spotted in the (FACTION_1) region. It is important to remain observant when traveling through this area. Law enforcement authorities have been alerted and are currently looking for these raiders.

row.Title: Crime is on the rise in (SECTOR_1)
row.Description_body: A local hijacking has been reported in the (FACTION_1) region of Astrox. Authorities have investigated the matter and are not commenting on the investigation at this time. They did however ask everyone to remain aware and on guard when traveling through the region.

row.Title: Raiders launched from local structure
row.Description_body: It has been reported that Raiders have launched from the raider hideout. It is recommended that all pilots traveling through this area keep their sensors active and weapons hot until the Astrox Security Patrol has time to clear this threat from the area.

row.Title: Raider spotted in the (FACTION_1) region
row.Description_body: It has been reported that Raiders have been hiding in the region. It is recommended that all pilots traveling through this area keep their sensors active and weapons hot until the Astrox Security Patrol has time to clear this threat from the area.

row.Title: (STATION_1) Board of Education receives additional funding
row.Description_body: (PERSON_1) made a public announcement today at the academic conference at (STATION_1) in the (FACTION_1) region. With additional funding allocated for this station, All classes offered to the general population have been reduced in cost. Hopefully this will encourage people to enroll in the university courses offered at this location.

row.Title: (STATION_1) Board of Education loses funding
row.Description_body: (PERSON_1) made a public announcement today at the academic conference at (STATION_1) in the (FACTION_1) region. Due to budget constraints, the courses offered at this university will require additional payments for enrollment. (PERSON_1) was quoted saying 'It is a sad day for all of us educators here at (STATION_1).'.

row.Title: Balanced Budget at the University of (STATION_1)
row.Description_body: After a lengthy meeting at the (STATION_1) conference center, (FACTION_1) board members have announced that they have come to an agreement on balancing the academic budget. Some classes will be provided additional resources, by trimming the fat from some of the over-budgeted courses.

row.Title: New (SHIPNAME) ship available at (STATION_1) station
row.Description_body: With the recent influx of resources pouring into the (FACTION_1) region, local markets have decided to begin production of a few starships. The first of these (SHIPNAME) ships have already reached a number of (FACTION_1) stations, and are currently available for purchase.

row.Title: New ship available in the (FACTION_1) region
row.Description_body: With the recent influx of resources pouring into the (FACTION_1) region, local markets have decided to begin production of a few starships. The first (SHIPNAME) ship has already arrived at (STATION_1), and is currently available for purchase.

row.Title: (FACTION_1) fabricators deliver new (SHIPNAME) ship.
row.Description_body: With the recent influx of resources pouring into the (FACTION_1) region, local markets have decided to begin production of a few starships. The first of these (SHIPNAME) ships have already reached a number of (FACTION_1) stations, and are currently available for purchase.

row.Title: Arrival of (SHIPNAME) ships in (FACTION_1) region
row.Description_body: With the recent influx of resources pouring into the (FACTION_1) region, local markets have decided to begin production of a few starships. Head to (STATION_1) in the (FACTION_1) region if you would like to check out the new (SHIPNAME).

row.Title: Security levels in (SECTOR_1) have Risen
row.Description_body: Additional Law Enforcement has been deployed to (SECTOR_1) in the (FACTION_1) region. Commander (PERSON_1) has announced that with the additional forces protecting (SECTOR_1), residents can expect less crime. Commander (PERSON_1) has issued a warning to all would-be raiders and outlaws alike, 'This is no longer a sanctuary for the lawless.'.

row.Title: (SECTOR_1) Security has dropped
row.Description_body: Resources in (SECTOR_1) have been on a steady decline for some time, causing law enforcement to cut back on it's available personnel. With less patrols on the job, crime is expected to rise in the coming weeks. Commander (PERSON_1) proclaimed that without immediate financial assistance, law enforcement will be unable to protect the residents of (SECTOR_1) properly.

row.Title: Security in (SECTOR_1) has been reviewed
row.Description_body: Law enforcement leaders of the (FACTION_1) region have reviewed the current security status of the (SECTOR_1) sector. Although no additional resources have been allocated to the region, (PERSON_1) believes that the new systems of crime detection, implemented earlier this cycle, will help cull the existing criminal elements in the area.

row.Title: Food production in (SECTOR_1) has Increased
row.Description_body: (PERSON_1) made a statement early this cycle, making the noted increase in the region's food production level. 'It is clear that the season's crop is greatly due to the increase in Starlight we have received.'. With levels like this, everyone can expect a bountiful synth-harvest this season.

row.Title: Starlight reduction in (SECTOR_1)
row.Description_body: Scientists in (SECTOR_1) have recorded a significant drop in the levels of starlight throughout the sector. It is not currently known what has caused this reduction in the light emitted from the microstar, but resident remain concerned about food synthesis at the season comes to a close.

row.Title: Food Synthesis has leveled out in (SECTOR_1)
row.Description_body: Scientists in the (SECTOR_1) sector are happy to report that the starlight levels are returning to normal. It is not known at this time what caused the recent fluctuations, but is believed that these levels will completely return to normal in the coming cycles.

row.Title: Atmospheric Hydration of the (SECTOR_1) has risen
row.Description_body: Scientists have reported that the atmospheric hydration ratios have risen in recent cycles. (SECTOR_1) has been fairly stable for some time now. It is unknown as to why these changes have occurred, but scientists in the region have promised to continue researching.

row.Title: Water Crystals in (SECTOR_1) are disappearing
row.Description_body: Atmospheric hydration levels have fallen in (SECTOR_1). A number of local scientists have recently started researching this phenomenon. It is guessed that recent changes in solar wind patterns have altered the environment.

row.Title: Liquid H2O levels are Normalizing in (SECTOR_1)
row.Description_body: New research has shown that the atmospheric hydration levels of the (SECTOR_1) sector have begun to level out. It has been many cycles since the scientists have been able to measure these levels due to a malfunction at the (PERSON_1) laboratory.

row.Title: Temperatures rise in (SECTOR_1)
row.Description_body: temperatures in the (SECTOR_1) sector are on the rise. Specialists have been tracking the increase and warned the local populace that it may be time to upgrade your thermal life support systems. Local stations have had a hard time keeping thermal regulators in stock after this recent jump in temperature.

row.Title: (SECTOR_1) Begins to cool
row.Description_body: (SECTOR_1) residents are breaking out the cold weather clothing after a recent drop in the sector's temperature. Scientists are claiming that the local microstar has been affected by recent waves of low level radiation passing through the sector. The temperature is expected to normalize in the coming cycles.

row.Title: A change of season as (SECTOR_1) temperatures level
row.Description_body: As expected, the temperatures in (SECTOR_1) have begun to return to normal levels. Scientists in the region are confident that things will level out over the next few cycles. (PERSON_1) was quoted when asked about the recent change, 'This was a great opportunity for us to research how our microstar affects our weather patterns here in (SECTOR_1).'.

row.Title: Waste levels (SECTOR_1) on the rise
row.Description_body: Local waste management officials are unable to keep space clean in (SECTOR_1). (FACTION_1) officials have been notified and local residents are not happy. With pollution levels this high, it is recommended you have a sufficient waste management system installed on your ships.

row.Title: A drop in (SECTOR_1)'s waste is commended
row.Description_body: Officials in (SECTOR_1) are happy to announce that waste levels in the sector have been reduced significantly. This should have to boost tourism and increase the quality of life for all the residents in (SECTOR_1) and the surrounding (FACTION_1) areas.

row.Title: In (SECTOR_1), Waste levels normalize
row.Description_body: Waste Management officials have announced that the recent efforts to normalize waste levels in (SECTOR_1), have been successful. (PERSON_1) was credited with leading the effort to study these changes and how they affect the local lifeforms. A request has been made to the (FACTION_1) council for addition research funding.

row.Title: In (SECTOR_1), a strange energy surge has been detected.
row.Description_body: Scientists have discovered a strange surge of the energy levels in (SECTOR_1). (PERSON_1), the lead scientist for the investigating research team thinks a wormhole could be present. Initial tests look promising, but the existence of a nearby wormhole has yet to be confirmed. The (FACTION_1) council has called for additional research funding in hopes of determining if a wormhole has spawned in (SECTOR_1).

row.Title: Energy burst in (SECTOR_1), Locals search for Wormhole.
row.Description_body: A sudden burst of energy in (SECTOR_1) has locals looking for a possible wormhole. (PERSON_1) is convinced that a wormhole has spawned in the area. Initial tests look promising, but the existence of a nearby wormhole has yet to be confirmed. The (FACTION_1) locals have pulled together funds in hopes of determining if a wormhole has visited their area in (SECTOR_1).

row.Title: Economic demand cycle peaks in (FACTION_1) Region
row.Description_body: Market demand has increased for a number of specialized items. The current market trends show these buy orders have affected a small number of (FACTION_1) stations. As demand increases for some items, stability and security will likely spread and boost the economy of the area. (PERSON_1), a local to the region was quoted saying, 'When local stations needs goods, everyone wins.'.

row.Description_body: Market demand has increased for a number of specialized items. The current market trends show these buy orders have affected a small number of (FACTION_1) stations. (PERSON_1), a local to the region was quoted saying, 'When local stations needs goods, everyone wins.'.

row.Title: (PERSON_1) Wins the (FACTION_1) lottery!
row.Description_body: (PERSON_1) was ecstatic to discover that they won the (FACTION_1) Lottery. Even though the grand prize was 500,000 zil, after the Alpharis Tax Commission got a hold of the winnings, (PERSON_1) was left with just over 130,000 zil. (PERSON_1) was quoted saying 'Every little bit helps, I am just glad to be a winner!'.

row.Title: (FACTION_1) Awards Ceremony was a great success!
row.Description_body: (FACTION_1) held their Awards for Excellence ceremony at the capital. It was hosted by the famous (PERSON_1), who arrived in fashion wearing a newly designed uniform. The event went smooth with many popular celebrities making an appearance.
